pr_title: Move getters from DelegateFinder to GameData/GameState

timeline.message: Move getters from DelegateFinder to GameData/GameState

timeline.bodyText: These 5 methods were moved from DelegateFinder and modified slightly to not be static methods.  All of the other changes in this PR are edits to use these getters instead of the ones in DelegateFinder.
timeline.author: trevan
